mapper.select: select distinct p.id, p.parent_id, p.name, p.url, p.type, p.icon, p.remake, p.create_time, p.update_time, p.label, p.path, p.is_home, p.order_num from sys_user as u left join sys_user_role as ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join sys_role as r on ur.role_id = r.id left join sys_permission as rp on rp.role_id = r.id lefe join sys_permission as p on rp.permisssion_id = p.id where u.id = #{userId} order by p.order_num asc
